attributes.action: Resolve the chaos caused by post Brexit arrangements.
attributes.additional_details: Why are we importing lamb from New Zealand, when France is on our doorstep. Not very Green!
attributes.background: The government need to take a much more pragmatic view to closer relationship with Europe. There is a generation of students who cannot undertake an internship year, due to ridiculously stringent visa arrangements, & these were the ones who suffered most during Covid. Old politicians, old views.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the UK's current relationship with the EU, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Seek UK-wide EU single market access equivalent to Northern Ireland's: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634074

Run a multiple choice referendum on the UK's relationship with the EU #Brexit: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636499

Apply to rejoin the EU: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631497
